title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.18 - Jackpot/fill functionality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.18 - Jackpot/fill functionality

State Regulations
A MCS system shall have an application or facility that
captures and processes every hand-pay message from each gaming device. Hand-pay
messages shall be created for single wins (jackpots), progressive jackpots and
accumulated credit cashouts (canceled credits), each of which results in
hand-pays. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.18

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
